voorbeeld10

Edward Hill

2022-06-09

Introduction

The theoretical foundation of this article is to be found in (Semlitsch et al., n.d.).

Also in (Davis, Strasburger, and Brown 2007) and in (Grosz 2005), (Reid et al. 2010), (Houben et al. 2010), (Schie 2008). Another reference from the ‘Diabetes Bibliography’ (Kuipers et al. 1999)

Methods

Data

## Warning: package 'readxl' was built under R version 4.1.3
##    Min. 1st Qu.  Median    Mean 3rd Qu.    Max.    NA's 
##     0.0     9.0    16.0    16.2    21.0    37.0       5

I am going to use a dataset and a file. The name of the dataset is NVM1Onderzoek.xlsx. We have data on 130 NVM data. The mean age of the subjects in the group is 38. The fivenumber statistics of the psychopathology factor (1. Min., 2. 1st Qu., 3. Median, 4. Mean 3rd Qu., 5. Max.) is 0, 2, 3, 6, 17

I have a link

Summary and Conclusions

References

Davis, L W, A M Strasburger, and L F Brown. 2007. “Mindfulness.” An Intervention for Anxiety in Schizophrenia. J Psychosoc Nurs 45: 23–29.
Grosz, Elizabeth. 2005. “Bergson, Deleuze and the becoming of unbecoming.” Parallax 11 (2): 4–13.
Houben, A J H, A M Jonk, N C Schaper, P W de Leeuw, E H Serné, Y M Smulders, and C D A Stehouwer. 2010. “Meal-related increases in microvascular vasomotion are impaired in obese individuals.” Diabetologia 53: 632.
Kuipers, H, H A Keizer, Tj Wiersma, R J Heine, and Others. 1999. “De standaard’Diabetes mellitus type 2’(eerste herziening) van het Nederlands Huisartsen Genootschap.” Ned Tijdschr Geneeskd 143: 2342–43.
Reid, R D, H E Tulloch, R J Sigal, G P Kenny, M Fortier, L McDonnell, G A Wells, N G Boule, P Phillips, and D Coyle. 2010. “Effects of aerobic exercise, resistance exercise or both, on patient-reported health status and well-being in type 2 diabetes mellitus: a randomised trial.” Diabetologia 53 (4): 632–40.
Schie, Carine H M van. 2008. “Neuropathy: mobility and quality of life.” Diabetes/Metabolism Research and Reviews 24 (S1): S45—–S51.
Semlitsch, Thomas, Ulrich Grouven-IQWiG, Klaus Jeitler, Lars G Hemkens, Tatjana Janzen-IQWiG, Eva Nagele, Andrea Siebenhofer, and Karl Horvath. n.d. “Entscheiden trotz Unsicherheit: 14. Jahrestagung des Deutschen Netzwerks Evidenzbasierte Medizin.”
